languages.text: {n}Читать эмоции по половине лица и голосу, преображенному воксом — задача непростая, однако вам удается уловить особенный оттенок в речи Вигдис. Мастер вокса не просто опечалена разладом с Идирой — она раздавлена им.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Читать эмоции по половине лица и голосу, преображенному воксом — задача непростая, однако вам удается уловить особенный оттенок в речи Вигдис. Мастер Вокса не просто опечалена разладом с Идирой — она раздавлена им.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Interpreting the Vox Master's emotions based on half a face and a vox-modulated voice is no easy task, but you manage to catch the undercurrent in Vigdis's words. The Vox Master is not merely saddened by her rift with Idira, she is devastated by it.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Читать эмоции по половине лица и голосу, преображенному воксом — задача непростая, однако вам удается уловить особенный оттенок в речи Вигдис. Мастер вокса не просто опечалена разладом с Идирой — она раздавлена им.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Interpreting the Vox Master's emotions based on half a face and a vox-modulated voice is no easy task, but you manage to catch the undercurrent in Vigdis's words. The Vox Master is not merely saddened by her rift with Idira, she is devastated by it.{/n}

{n}Interpreting the Vox Master's emotions based on half a face and a vox-modulated voice is no easy task, but you manage to catch the undercurrent in Vigdis's words. The Vox Master is not merely saddened by her rift with Idira, she is devastated by it.{/n}

{n}Interpreting the Vox Master's emotions based on half a face and a vox-modulated voice is no easy task, but you manage to catch the undercurrent in Vigdis's words. The Vox Master is not merely saddened by her rift with Idira, she is devastated by it.{/n}

{n}Interpreting the Vox Master's emotions based on half a face and a vox-modulated voice is no easy task, but you manage to catch the undercurrent in Vigdis's words. The Vox Master is not merely saddened by her rift with Idira, she is devastated by it.{/n}

languages.text: {n}想通过半张脸与音阵系统调制过的声音来确认音阵大师的情绪，并不是件容易的事情，但你还是察觉到了维格迪斯话语中的感情。音阵大师不仅为她与伊迪拉之间产生嫌隙而感到难过，这件事情还对她造成了重大打击。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Interpreting the Vox Master's emotions based on half a face and a vox-modulated voice is no easy task, but you manage to catch the undercurrent in Vigdis's words. The Vox Master is not merely saddened by her rift with Idira, she is devastated by it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}想通过半张脸与音阵系统调制过的声音来确认音阵大师的情绪，并不是件容易的事情，但你还是察觉到了维格迪斯话语中的感情。音阵大师不仅为她与伊迪拉之间产生嫌隙而感到难过，这件事情还对她造成了重大打击。{/n}

languages.text: {n}No es fácil interpretar las emociones de la maestra de vocos, dado que la mitad de su cara está tapada y su voz está modulada por un voco, pero logras descifrar la corriente subyacente en las palabras de Vigdis. La maestra de vocos no está solo triste por sus discrepancias con Idira. Está hecha polvo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Interpreting the Vox Master's emotions based on half a face and a vox-modulated voice is no easy task, but you manage to catch the undercurrent in Vigdis's words. The Vox Master is not merely saddened by her rift with Idira, she is devastated by it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}No es fácil interpretar las emociones de la maestra de vocos, dado que la mitad de su cara está tapada y su voz está modulada por un voco, pero logras descifrar la corriente subyacente en las palabras de Vigdis. La maestra de vocos no está solo triste por sus discrepancias con Idira. Está hecha polvo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}半分見える顔とヴォクスで変調された声から彼女の感情を汲み取るのは難しいものの、ヴィグディスの言葉から心に押し込めた気持ちは感じ取ることができる。イディラとの間にできた亀裂にただ悲しんでいるだけではなく、精神的に参っているようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Interpreting the Vox Master's emotions based on half a face and a vox-modulated voice is no easy task, but you manage to catch the undercurrent in Vigdis's words. The Vox Master is not merely saddened by her rift with Idira, she is devastated by it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}半分見える顔とヴォクスで変調された声から彼女の感情を汲み取るのは難しいものの、ヴィグディスの言葉から心に押し込めた気持ちは感じ取ることができる。イディラとの間にできた亀裂にただ悲しんでいるだけではなく、精神的に参っているようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Emotionen der Voxmeisterin anhand eines halben Gesichts und einer vox-modulierten Stimme zu deuten, ist keine einfache Aufgabe, aber es gelingt dir, den Unterton in Vigdis' Worten wahrzunehmen. Die Voxmeisterin ist über ihren Bruch mit Idira nicht nur traurig, sondern am Boden zerstört.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Interpreting the Vox Master's emotions based on half a face and a vox-modulated voice is no easy task, but you manage to catch the undercurrent in Vigdis's words. The Vox Master is not merely saddened by her rift with Idira, she is devastated by it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Emotionen der Voxmeisterin anhand eines halben Gesichts und einer vox-modulierten Stimme zu deuten, ist keine einfache Aufgabe, aber es gelingt dir, den Unterton in Vigdis' Worten wahrzunehmen. Die Voxmeisterin ist über ihren Bruch mit Idira nicht nur traurig, sondern am Boden zerstört.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Il n'est guère facile d'interpréter les émotions de la maîtresse-vox sur la seule foi d'une moitié de visage et d'une voix altérée par son émetteur, mais vous parvenez tout de même à déceler ses sentiments sous-jacents. Bien au-delà du simple chagrin, Vigdis est dévastée par le fossé qui s'est creusé entre elle et Idira.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Interpreting the Vox Master's emotions based on half a face and a vox-modulated voice is no easy task, but you manage to catch the undercurrent in Vigdis's words. The Vox Master is not merely saddened by her rift with Idira, she is devastated by it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Il n'est guère facile d'interpréter les émotions de la maîtresse-vox sur la seule foi d'une moitié de visage et d'une voix altérée par son émetteur, mais vous parvenez tout de même à déceler ses sentiments sous-jacents. Bien au-delà du simple chagrin, Vigdis est dévastée par le fossé qui s'est creusé entre elle et Idira.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yarım bir yüz ve voks ile değiştirilmiş bir sesten Voks Üstadı'nın duygularını yorumlayabilmek kolay olmasa da Vigdis'in sözlerinin altındaki anlamları yakalamayı başarıyorsun. İdira ile arasına soğukluk girmesi onu üzmekle kalmıyor, içten içe perişan da ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Interpreting the Vox Master's emotions based on half a face and a vox-modulated voice is no easy task, but you manage to catch the undercurrent in Vigdis's words. The Vox Master is not merely saddened by her rift with Idira, she is devastated by it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Voks Üstadı'nın duygularını yarım bir yüz ve voks ile değiştirilmiş bir sesten yorumlayabilmek kolay iş olmasa da Vigdis'in sözcüklerinin altındaki anlamları yakalayabilmeyi başarıyorsun. Voks Üstadı, İdira ile arasına soğukluk girdiği için yalnızca üzgün değil, bu durum onu içten içe perişan da ediyor.{/n}
